entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 3:38AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Arctic front to bring snow and gusty winds Sunday... Snow showers will develop along an arctic front which will quickly push east across the Interior Sunday and Sunday night.
